That is so very true! I feel the same way! 


 "Nature is showing us only t=
he tail of the lion, but I have no doubt that the lion belongs to it even t=
hough, because of its large size, it cannot totally reveal itself all at on=
ce." 
-=E2=80=94 Albert Einstein


"It is far better to grasp the universe =
as it really is than to persist in delusions, however satisfying and reassu=
ring."
--Carl Sagan


"There is no such thing as an insignificant detail. D=
on't just look 
for what you want to find."
-- Me LOL




_________________=

From: ourobouros2k2 <ourobouros2k2@...>
To: EVP-ITC@y=
ahoogroups.com
Sent: Saturday, August 15, 2009 9:09:53 PM
Subject: [EVP-ITC=
] Re: C2C show

  
C2C has really declined under Noory. I don't dislike him=
, but he is no Art Bell. Art was a legend, but Noory is a tad too narcissis=
tic for my taste, always seeking validation from guests that he has some su=
perintuitive skill. Back in the Bell days, I usually listened most every ni=
ght, because the guests were thought provoking and his interviewing style m=
ade the shows legendary. Noory unfortunately can have a brilliant guest lin=
eup and still make the show a snoozer. 

I am rambling on, but I thought th=
e segment was a good one, if not long enough. Hell they could have devoted =
the whole show to you and Bill and I would have been happy.

Andy

--- In E=
VP-ITC@yahoogroups .com, Frank Sumption <purplealiengirl@ ...> wrote:
>
> T=
o be fair, they claim they never received the voice files. So I don't know
=
> what the deal was/is, but that's enough for me, no more shows.
> 
>  Fran=
k-S
